Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are 3.5-point favorites as they look to stop a 15-game road losing streak.
The Washington Wizards (6-26) have 13 wins in 32 games against the spread this season.
The Pelicans have been favorites in eight games this season and won three (37.5%) of those contests.
The Wizards have been underdogs in 32 games this season and have come away with the win six times (18.8%) in those contests.
